channel.title: Jack Audio Support on Linux
channel.description:
Hey hey,
is there Jack support for the device using it on linux. Can i send audio from my soundcard to the Axoloti?? I now found out that i cant test the Patcher without the Axoloti. Am i able to uses the clds patch for example with audio from my soundcard ???
Thank you and Hello iam new here

item.title: Jack Audio Support on Linux
item.dc:creator: @valmir
item.description:
@valmir wrote:

Axoloti is also shown as a midi device under Linux, IIRC with alsa midi.

Read full topic

item.title: Jack Audio Support on Linux
item.dc:creator: @lokki
item.description:
@lokki wrote:

hey,

no you cannot send audio via usb to the axoloti. but you can connect your sound card output to the axoloti input and the axoloti output to your sound card input...

Read full topic
